entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:12 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:12 PM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
